customCommands.name: code-fix
customCommands.prompt:
```{{{ input }}}```

---

Fix the selected code and return the corrected version. Return only the fixed code. Do not include a preamble or any explanatory text.

customCommands.name: code-refactor
customCommands.prompt:
```{{{ input }}}```

---

Refactor the selected code to make it more readable, maintainable, and efficient. Return the refactored code. Return only the code. Do not include a preamble or any explanatory text.

customCommands.name: code-explain
customCommands.prompt:
```{{{ input }}}```

---

Explain the functionality and purpose of the selected code. Return a detailed explanation of the code. Return only the explanation. Do not include a preamble or any explanatory text.

customCommands.name: code-optimize
customCommands.prompt:
```{{{ input }}}```

---

Optimize the selected code to improve its performance and efficiency. Return the optimized code. Return only the code. Do not include a preamble or any explanatory text.

doc-generate
